About

I am Esteban Ramos a programmer currently working at NCR Corporation. I graduated from Emory University with a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science and an Applied Math Minor in Dec 2019. This site is supposed to stand as a simple place to showcase my work and stuff I am up to or whatever I find interesting really.

About this site

This website is built ontop of the Hyde theme for Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages. I easily recommend Jekyll as a framework to build static sites with, it is simply a pleasure to work with.

Hyde was made by the fantastic developer @mdo.

A lot of this websites layout was also inspired by the personal website of Chris Schuld. I do recommend checking out his blog posts on using {Jekyll with Docker](https://chrisschuld.com/2019/02/building-your-own-website-in-jekyll/), it definitely made the process a lot easier.

Icons made by Swifticons from www.flaticon.com
